publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-273 Mr Rob Gibson: GM Free Zone on Shetland Islandsâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the recent consultation by Shetland Islands Council environmental forum on the creation of a genetic-modification-free zone on the islands and urges the Scottish Executive to assist the local authority achieve this aim in every way possible. Supported by: Mr Mark Ruskell*, Rosie Kane*, Eleanor Scott*, Mark Ballard*, Robin Harper*, Michael Matheson*, Jim Mather*, Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Shiona Baird*, Carolyn Leckie*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Neil*, Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Shona Robison*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-273 GM Free Zone on Shetland Islands (lodged on 20 August 2003) Linda Fabiani*
